item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 18, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. arXiv moving from Cornell servers to Google Cloud (99 points | 65 comments)
2. Kagi Assistant is now available to all users (290 points | 162 comments)
3. Free high-performance cross-platform game engine (73 points | 21 comments)
4. Gemini 2.5 Flash (820 points | 422 comments)
5. Researcher proposes model replacing dark energy/matter to explain universe (40 points | 36 comments)
6. Deafening Silence from the Cybersecurity Industry (146 points | 63 comments)
7. Potatoes in the Mail (339 points | 147 comments)
8. Unikernel Linux (UKL) (2023) (21 points | 2 comments)
9. I analyzed chord progressions in 680k songs (175 points | 74 comments)
10. An intro to DeepSeek's distributed file system (544 points | 86 comments)
11. What do I think about Lua after shipping a project with 60k lines of code? (142 points | 56 comments)
12. Decreased CO2 during breathwork: emergence of altered states of consciousness (234 points | 105 comments)
13. Aqua Tofana: The 17th Century Husband Killer (40 points | 12 comments)
14. Is it possible to write plain C iOS app in 2025? (91 points | 45 comments)
15. 1,700 Year Old Egg Never Broke (46 points | 20 comments)
16. The Size of Packets (55 points | 23 comments)
17. Discord's face scanning age checks 'start of a bigger shift' (241 points | 293 comments)
18. Tracking types of non-parents in the United States (14 points | 12 comments)
19. Once banned, Poland's stately 18th century dance garners UNESCO honors (2024) (45 points | 22 comments)
20. Milwaukee M18 Battery Reverse Engineering (181 points | 77 comments)
21. Curiosity rover finds large carbon deposits on Mars (6 points | discuss)
22. HDR‑Infused Emoji (244 points | 135 comments)
23. I gave up on self-hosted Sentry (2024) (120 points | 93 comments)
24. Multipaint: Draw pictures with color limitations of 8-bit and 16-bit platforms (5 points | discuss)
25. Startup Exercise: What can't be solved with money? (2011) (6 points | 1 comment)
26. Viral ChatGPT trend is doing 'reverse location search' from photos (56 points | 22 comments)
27. AMP and why emails are not (and should never be) interactive (14 points | 3 comments)
28. Google is illegally monopolizing online advertising tech, judge rules (772 points | 409 comments)
29. Show HN: AgentAPI – HTTP API for Claude Code, Goose, Aider, and Codex (136 points | 13 comments)
30. Unauthenticated Remote Code Execution in Erlang/OTP SSH (181 points | 48 comments)
